These are recommended choices, delivered as separate packages: - webpack-cli (https://github.com/webpack/webpack-cli)   The original webpack full-featured CLI.We will use "npm" to install the CLI via "npm install -D".Do you want to install 'webpack-cli' (yes/no): yesInstalling 'webpack-cli' (running 'npm install -D webpack-cli')...npm ERR! code EINVALIDPACKAGENAMEnpm ERR! Invalid package name "_cross-spawn@6.0.5@cross-spawn": name cannot start with an underscore; name can only contain URL-friendly charactersnpm ERR!
